data.message: MCP Performance Best Practices: 1) Connection pooling (pool_size: 20, max_connections: 100, timeouts: query 30s, connection 10s, idle 300s). 2) Multi-level caching (L1: cache with 5-60min TTL, L2: connection pooling, L3: async operations, L4: batch operations). 3) Use message brokers (RabbitMQ/Kafka) for async request processing. 4) MCP servers can handle 5000+ context ops/sec with proper optimization. 5) Alert on response_time > 5s and pool_utilization > 90%.
